name: The Gemma Classic
description: Our signature beef patty topped with fresh lettuce, tomato, pickles, and our secret AI sauce on a brioche bun.

name: Gemma Double Stack
description: Double beef patties with melted cheddar cheese, grilled onions, and extra AI sauce. For those who need more compute power.

name: Silicon Valley Vege
description: A plant-based patty made from mushrooms and black beans, served with avocado smash and vegan mayo.

name: Python Fries
description: Crispy curly fries seasoned with cajun spices. Long and twisted like a python script.

name: Neural Shake
description: A thick strawberry vanilla milkshake that boosts your brain power.
